I think what bothers me is seeing people treating this shit like "the quintessential NTR" or something. Otomedori could classify as comedy with how hilariously over-the-top, edgy and silly it is. It's generic as fuck to the point of unintentional satire, just like everything else by Carn.

So this is the infamous Otomedori, huh? You guys are really overreacting about the severity of the whole thing. This manga tries so hard to get under the reader's skin that it's impossible to take it seriously. I feel nothing. This story isn't even about the girls feeling pleasure. This is just humiliation porn featuring a weak hetare MC that we have no reason to sympathize with. 9 pages in (not even counting the intro) and the girl is already getting gangbanged while the MC jerks off. There's no buildup. It goes from 0 to 100 in seconds and stays at 100 for the rest of the story because Otome has zero brain cells. The only "dark" element is the MC getting broken and making goofy facial expressions, but again, we have no reason to care.

One of my very first NTRs, read it and felt so disgusted after that in a way that was so new to me, then i read a few dozen more NTRs and now coming back to it I think its still a masterpiece, the best part is that by the end, Otome was blatantly cheating and she enjoys it, something that is always missing in most NTRs, most just start with a stupid bitch who gets stupider each time she is fucked, I hate simple "mind control" NTR also, its just cheap.

the imouto was also an amazing addition, though whatever she has for her bro is clearly not love, still she played all this very nice, sadly though the MC was weak and clearly he was made weak for the sake of the plot, I guess if I had to mention something boring about this NTR it would be that.
